column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I would also highly recommend coming here with a group instead of just one person.  You'll want to try lots of different things
column2: but if it's just you and one other person
column4: since you probably won't be able to finish each tapa if you're getting quite a few).  My favorite way to do it is to get one of the paella selections and then lots of tapas that everyone can grab from.
